dcterms:description: The ICDAR 2015 competition dataset consists of images containing incidental scene texts with arbitrary orientations, used for evaluating text detection methods.
dcterms:title: ICDAR 2015

dcterms:description: The ICDAR 2013 dataset is used for focused scene text detection, consisting of images with horizontal texts.
dcterms:title: ICDAR 2013
